div.p: April 28, 2020 Greetings Red Hawk Family, As you may have heard, Governor Kelly is expected to provide more guidance regarding the status of the current stay-at-home...

p.a: HHS JV Baseball Here v. Holton

div.p: SENIOR SALUTE Jaiden Nevels is the daughter of Maria & Jeremy Armstrong. She plans to attend Bellus Cosmetology School. She describes her senior year as crazy, fun, and interesting. She will always remember the fun she had in the art room. view image

SENIOR SALUTE Mason Ward is the son of Jim & Diane Ward. He plans to attend Highland Comm College and then KSU, majoring in Ag Tech Management. The HHS tradition he is most proud of is Spirit Week, "for one week out of the year everything becomes interesting". view image

SENIOR SALUTE Maggie Saul is the daughter of Cathy & Rick Duncan. She plans to attend Pittsburgh State and major in biology. She describes her senior year as memorable, short, and unpredictable. Her favorite HHS tradition is Community Day. view image

SENIOR SALUTE Austyn Koch is the daughter of Robyn & Aaron Lanter and granddaughter of Debra Wright. She plans to attend Highland Comm College, majoring in Business Management or Agribusiness. The HHS tradition she is most proud of is the bonfire and bonfire games of Homecoming. view image
